attributes.title: HORRIBLE😾💔
attributes.review: Honestly, I thought downloading this app would make me feel different about trump but it makes me dislike him even more!! After I downloaded I saw oranges everywhere I looked, it was like messing with my brain! My bed was orange, my room was orange, EVERYTHING WAS ORANGE! Imagine every single thing being orange, you start to get sick of it. So when I went to bed one night and pulled out my orange phone I went on this app again, thinking I can finally escape from my orange fiasco but NO! I saw an even orangier thing on my screen! I’ve had enough. This app has made me hate the color orange. DO NOT DOWNLOAD😡💔🐻

If I could leave a 0 star review I would. This app has been nothing but ridiculous and irritating for me. First I had to wait 2 WHOLE days for the app to download! After I finally got into the app I realized that I had received a love note from Trump himself. It read "As a man in my position, I can't afford to catch a case but you're making me want to. You remind me so much of my daughter." I am absolutely disgusted and demand that this app be taken down. With all the rest of these reviews that I read I hope it becomes apparent that this app is toxic and the community is as well.

attributes.title: not today mr. cheeto😐
attributes.review: i’m just going to say that this app is the worst thing anyone has ever created. it took several hours to download and when it was done it read my debit card info and made me go bankrupt. this resulted in my house being put up for sale and now i have no where to live. i blame this app for the misfortune it caused my family and i in the .03 seconds that i had it downloaded onto my phone. whatever old fart created this app really STINKS like fish and should find something better to do with his life rather than ruin many other peoples life FOR NO REASON🤢👎🏽

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP , DONT DOWNLOAD IT 😿💔🙄
attributes.review: this is app is a total disaster, not only did it take DAYS to download 🙄 but it also hacked all my data and everything , sis- 💔 I was heart broken anyways. i would open the app but it would just close. and my phone didn’t work after that I had to get a new one and a new email because they had that hacked too 😡 also people would receive messages from “me” but it was this app that was messing with my life 🙄😔 it ruined my life 💔😔 and now I have no friends 😿 anyways don’t download this app 😘 it’ll make your life worst 😨😻. chile anyways byeee 😁💗

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER😡😖🤬
attributes.review:
this app takes about 30 minutes to download (about the amount of time it took bunker boy to shuffle down the ramp at the military graduation he forced) and then it just shut down for weeks (like the government has repeatedly on bunker boy’s watch) and then it made it to where my tiktok app wouldn’t work (unlike when bunker boy’s hate rally was messed up :( ). don’t download this app! it’s worse than the government trying to “throw God’s wonderful breathing system out” by telling you wearing a mask during a global pandemic (karen!!! that one is for you!)

attributes.title: Horrible experience 🙄😧💀👉🏼👈🏻
attributes.review:
So I downloaded this app because my pet alien 👽 I stole from Area 51 told me to and let me tell you it was horrible so many bad things happened as soon as I opened it my great great great great grandpa woke up from his coffin my sister had an alien baby my dad freed el chapo and my mom made waffles!!!!!!!!!
How dare she make waffles 😱 we only eat pancakes she’s a traitor 😭

Anyways this app is bad even the monster under my bed told me I better delete that 💩 or else he’ll call the police on me but I think that monster is a Karen he complains about everything he needs to find a job rent ain’t free 🙄

attributes.title: TAKE IT DOWN
attributes.review: I got the app and opened it. The it started asking me if I knew the muffin man! DO YOU KNOW THE MUFFIN MAN!! DO YOU KNOW THE MUFFIN MAN!! I started to ball my eyes out because I have no clue who the muffin man is!!! And to be honest I don’t like muffins. Then when I said I didn’t know the muffin man it started to call me awful names!!! I started to cry again!!! It logged me out and turned the background on my phone into a blueberry muffin!!! Then my phone levitated into the air. And singing DO YOU KNOW THE MUFFIN MAN THE MUFFIN MAN THE MUFFIN MAN WHO LIVES ON SATION’S LAINE!!! THEN IT FLEW OUT MY WINDOW AND TRANSFORMED INTO THE MUFFIN MAN!!! Anyway this is a awful app I have to get a brand new phone because it turned into the muffin man.

attributes.title: Horrible !!!!
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, I got a warning saying that it could detect that I was Mexican and threatened to deport me and my family back to Dominican Republic... apparently it could also tell that I was supporting the BLM movement and was starting to call me a thug even though I’m really Mexican and proceeded to ask me for where they can go to a Non-BLM area before having to hide into the White House. Trump sent me a message saying “Blue Lives Matter” and asked me to support his case against his niece book that shows how much of a great man he is. Please do not get this app. It will brainwash you like the man he is.

attributes.title: USELESS
attributes.review: i tried to walk my sibling on their leash in the park. i was mad that someone was walking their dog so my sibling grew wings and tossed me around like a lasso in the air. eventually the wings were cut off once i got on his back. i fell into the trash and he landed on a mouse. he had way too many mutations that this app gave him Alice in wonderland syndrome. he then turned into a penis so now they have him in a container. i was walking my horse and my pp brother on my street and everyone started to ride these giant bats. they treated them like unicorns so i turned my horse into one. overall this app doesn’t do what it should. DELETE CORONA MAN
